name: geocode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trueway_geocoding.
Tool description: Forward and Reverse Geocoding
API description: Fetch geocoordinates for a given address using the TrueWay Geocoding API.

address.description: The address that you want to geocode.

language.description: The language in which to return results. Default is 'en'.

country.description: The country code to narrow the search results.

bounds.description: The bounding box to narrow the search results.
